channel.title: Monochrome Missions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monochrome Missions" - Here's a few missions/text to add to your list- only have successful missions saved as plain text, sorry.

item.title: Re: Monochrome Missions
item.content:encoded:
New Monochrome Special Mission-
The Dark Hour
Miss Kitty tells you of a time within time!
Look For It >

Taijutsu

Focus!

You look at your watch - the time is approaching. What happens?

Difficulty: 20 Successes: 20

Fail. Nothing happens. Did you miss it?

Jgirl note: these are really hard to do- better use the -30 stam jutsu for all of them, and have permanent item boosts.

Success! The world goes dark for a split second, and the place bursts into motion!

Genjutsu

Defend!

Your classmates, in this moment out of time, draw arcane weapons and attack each other! Survive!

Difficulty: 20 Successes: 20

Success! You manage to dodge, as you become accustomed to this new dimension!

Ninjutsu

React

During the melee, a deadly flash goes for your neck!

Difficulty: 20 Successes: 20

Fail. Your spiritual hard rolls from your shoulders, and you flash back to the real world.

Jgirl note: hard? not head?

Success! You backflip away, surviving by a hair's breadth!

You look upon your attack.. and you hear a 'sip-p-p-p' he smiles evilly, flipping his hair and drinking a cup of ghostly tea.

It is Mister Tea!

"You thought me dead? No. I am not dead."

"I am Free."

"Free of the shackles of Pants. Free to be as I desire. Free to revel in No Pants Day. I have ripped them from my soul. I am immortal. I am Pantsless."

You step back, as the rest of the assembled crowd cowers from his power. "Join me," he says. "Remove your Pants, and become more powerful than you've ever imagined."

Before you can reply, the Dark Hour ends, and everyone snaps back to their bodies, and the world continues on. A remnant of the world within this world - the Dark Hour - stays with you.

You got The Dark Band!

Jgirl note- OH NOES EVIL MR TEA!

You got Miss Kitty!
